title: Justice League
description: DC’s greatest heroes team up to battle powerful threats and save the world.
long-description: Batman and Wonder Woman recruit a team of metahumans to face a catastrophic threat and restore balance after Superman's death.
casts: Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot, Henry Cavill, Jason Momoa, Ezra Miller, Ray Fisher

title: Kim Possible
description: A high school student saves the world from evil villains in her spare time.
long-description: Kim Possible balances high school life while battling villains with her sidekick Ron Stoppable and his pet naked mole-rat Rufus.
casts: Christy Carlson Romano, Will Friedle, Tahj Mowry, John DiMaggio

title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
description: Scooby and the gang uncover mysteries and dark secrets in their hometown.
long-description: In a more serialized and darker take on the classic franchise, Mystery Inc. tackles a larger mystery involving their town’s spooky past.
casts: Frank Welker, Mindy Cohn, Grey Griffin, Matthew Lillard

title: Avatar the Last Airbender
description: Aang, the last Airbender, must master all elements to defeat the Fire Nation.
long-description: In a world where people can bend the elements, a young monk named Aang must master all four to bring peace and end a long-standing war.
casts: Zach Tyler Eisen, Mae Whitman, Jack De Sena, Dante Basco

title: Samurai Jack
description: A samurai warrior is flung into a dystopian future by his arch-nemesis Aku.
long-description: Trapped in a dystopian future, a noble samurai known only as Jack journeys to defeat the shape-shifting demon Aku and return to the past.
casts: Phil LaMarr, Mako, Tara Strong, Kevin Michael Richardson

title: Batman: The Animated Series
description: Bruce Wayne fights crime in Gotham City as the mysterious Batman.
long-description: An acclaimed take on the Dark Knight, blending noir storytelling, complex characters, and striking visuals. A cornerstone of superhero animation.
casts: Kevin Conroy, Mark Hamill, Efrem Zimbalist Jr.

title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
description: A teenager discovers a secret world of trolls beneath his hometown.
long-description: Jim Lake Jr. becomes the first human Trollhunter and must defend two worlds against evil. From the imagination of Guillermo del Toro.
casts: Anton Yelchin, Kelsey Grammer, Charlie Saxton
tags: trolls, magic, fantasy, guillermo del toro, teen hero

title: Generator Rex
description: A teenager with nanites battles monsters and tries to save humanity.
long-description: Rex Salazar is an EVO with the power to control nanites. He works for Providence to stop threats and uncover his past.
casts: Daryl Sabara, Grey DeLisle, John DiMaggio
tags: nanotech, mutations, action, teen hero, sci-fi

title: Ben 10
description: Ben Tennyson uses a device called the Omnitrix to transform into various aliens.
long-description: 10-year-old Ben discovers the Omnitrix, gaining powers to transform into different aliens and fight evil alongside his cousin Gwen and Grandpa Max.
casts: Tara Strong, Paul Eiding, Meagan Smith
tags: aliens, omnitrix, hero, sci-fi, cartoon network

title: Teen Titans
description: Young superheroes team up to fight villains and handle teenage life.
long-description: Robin leads a team of teen superheroes including Starfire, Raven, Beast Boy, and Cyborg as they balance crimefighting with growing up.
casts: Scott Menville, Hynden Walch, Greg Cipes
tags: teen heroes, superheroes, dc comics, team, titans

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Four mutant turtles trained in ninjitsu fight crime in New York City.
long-description: Raised in the sewers of New York City and trained by their rat sensei, Splinter, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles take on criminals and supervillains to protect their city.
casts: Michael Sinterniklaas, Wayne Grayson, Sam Riegel, Frank Frankson
tags: mutants, ninja, turtles, crime-fighting, sewer, action

title: The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
description: Marvel’s greatest heroes unite to face powerful threats to Earth.
long-description: As the world's most dangerous super-villains escape from prisons across the globe, a team of heroes must assemble to stop them before it's too late.
casts: Eric Loomis, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Rick D. Wasserman, Fred Tatasciore

title: Weathering with You
description: A teenage boy runs away to Tokyo and meets a girl who can control the weather.
long-description: When high-schooler Hodaka runs away to Tokyo, he meets Hina, a girl with a mysterious ability to stop the rain and clear the sky.
casts: Kotaro Daigo, Nana Mori, Shun Oguri, Sei Hiraizumi
tags: weather, tokyo, love story, magic, fantasy

title: Suzume
description: A high‑school girl embarks on a mystical journey to close doors causing disasters.
long-description: Suzume follows a young girl who discovers magical doors across Japan that lead to disasters and chaos—doors she must now close before catastrophe strikes.
casts: Nanoka Hara, Hokuto Matsumura, Eri Fukatsu, Shota Sometani
tags: door, mystery, earthquake, magical realism, journey

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja seeks recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage of his village.
long-description: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous ninja with a powerful secret, trains to become the leader of his village and gain the respect of everyone around him.
casts: Junko Takeuchi, Noriaki Sugiyama, Chie Nakamura, Kazuhiko Inoue
tags: ninja, village, power, spirit, legacy, training

title: Doremon
description: A robotic cat from the future helps a clumsy boy navigate life’s challenges.
long-description: Doremon, a robotic cat from the 22nd century, is sent to help Nobita, a young boy, improve his future through gadgets and guidance.
casts: Wasabi Mizuta, Megumi Ōhara, Yumi Kakazu, Subaru Kimura

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: A young swordsman fights demons to save his sister and avenge his family.
long-description: After his family is slaughtered by demons, Tanjiro Kamado joins the Demon Slayer Corps to seek justice and cure his demon-turned sister.
casts: Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitō, Hiro Shimono, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights to survive against monstrous giants in a dystopian world.
long-description: In a world where giants devour humans, Eren Yeager and his friends join the Survey Corps to uncover the truth and fight back.
casts: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Daisuke Ono

title: Crayon Shin-chan
description: A mischievous five‑year‑old causes hilarious chaos with his wild antics.
long-description: Follow Shin-chan, a cheeky preschooler, as he goes on wild and absurd adventures with his family and friends in Kasukabe.
casts: Akiko Yajima, Miki Narahashi, Keiji Fujiwara, Satomi Kōrogi
tags: child, humor, japan, everyday life, prank

title: Coco
description: A boy journeys to the Land of the Dead to uncover his family’s musical heritage.
long-description: Young Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary musician, and discovers the importance of family and legacy.
production: Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures
casts: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A young Viking befriends a dragon and changes his tribe’s view on the creatures.
long-description: Hiccup, a young Viking, challenges tradition by forming a bond with a dragon and proving that dragons and humans can coexist.
casts: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson, America Ferrera

title: Your Name.
description: Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies and form a deep connection across time.
long-description: Mitsuha and Taki find themselves linked by fate when they begin switching bodies. Their search for each other leads to a time-bending emotional journey.
casts: Ryunosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryo Narita, Aoi Yuki
tags: body swap, time travel, romance, japan, destiny

title: Ratatouille
description: A rat with culinary dreams befriends a chef to pursue cooking in Paris.
long-description: Remy, a rat with an exceptional sense of taste, partners with a kitchen boy in a famous Paris restaurant to live his dream of becoming a chef.
production: Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures
casts: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Peter Sohn

title: Big Hero 6
description: A robotics prodigy teams up with friends and an inflatable robot to fight crime.
long-description: After a tragedy, Hiro Hamada forms a team of tech-savvy friends and a lovable robot, Baymax, to stop a masked villain and uncover a deeper mystery.
casts: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung, T.J. Miller
tags: robot, superhero, tech, san fransokyo, loss
